DXFLR6BD5Z5N3TFJ35TEZ24OWU.body: The states that have peaked with Covid infections average about 45 days to drop to an infection rate that is 10 percent of the peak rate.  That means that once Texas, Arizona, California and Florida peak  (this week maybe?), the US infection rate will be dropping virtually every day for 45 days.  I expect ZM stock price to mirror that downward tend closely.

ZDKPPZIQDKNGW2DXPZWRCBQKSI.body: Just glance at the earnings chart. Analysts have been low-balling estimates for awhile now. They knew exactly what they were doing - ZM didn't "beat" anything. Even their latest quarter "blowout, best ever earnings print in the history of the universe" was only 20 cents a share. But now analysts seem to think there are no more bigger fools to play, or not that many, and perhaps the jig is up. So, the current quarter consensus estimate seems a more realistic 45 cents. Let's see ZM "beat" that.
